email.title: Your document is about to expire

content.info: Documents saved in your My Papers application will soon expire:
content.view: Click on the name of the document to view it in your My Papers application.

content.paragraph01: You can get help directly by phone: 04Â 83Â 43Â 90Â 40
content.paragraph02: Free call Monday to Friday from 3pm to 5pm, Thursday until 7pm, and Saturday from 10am to 12pm.
content.paragraph03: You can also find help, report a problem, or suggest a good idea on the user support site My Papers.
content.paragraph04: Do not hesitate to write to us, the My Papers team will answer you with pleasure.
